Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows members of the New York city fire department pension fund to obtain service credit for retirement eligibility and retirement allowance from any of the public retirement systems of New York state
Summary: Allows members of the New York city fire department pension fund to obtain service credit for retirement eligibility and retirement allowance from any of the public retirement systems of New York state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to allowing members of the New York city fire department pension fund to obtain service credit for retirement eligibility and retirement allowance from any of the public retirement systems of New York state
